com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.animations

Class BlenderAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.plugins.blender.animations.BlenderAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class BlenderAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    An abstract representation of animation. The data stored here is mainly a raw action data loaded from blender. It can later be transformed into bone or spatial animation and applied to the specified node.

      • hasTrackName

        public boolean hasTrackName(java.lang.String name)
        Determines if the current action has a track of a given name. CAUTION! The names are case sensitive.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the track
        Returns:
        true if the track of a given name exists for the action and false otherwise
